citation: Proclamation under the Youth Justice (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Youth Justice (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Youth Justice (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 fix 1 September 2014 as the day on which section 18 of that Act commences.

25 August 2014

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. Petrusma

Minister for Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 August 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
